Overview

Front end development framework for MOO.com. Authored in LESS and using the the Bootstrap 3 framework. This toolkit aims to provide guidance on implementation, as well as documentation on all available CSS components that are available for use on our site.

The toolkit is based upon Twitter Bootstrap, and implements many of it's features and styles. Documentation and markup examples can be found on the bootstrap website http://getbootstrap.com/
